name: ButterCMS Nuxt Starter Project
description: Drop-in proof-of-concept NuxtJs app, fully integrated with your ButterCMS account.

NUXT_ENV_BUTTER_API_TOKEN.description: The API token of your ButterCMS account

HOST.description: DO NOT CHANGE THIS VALUE. Nuxt needs HOST to be set to 0.0.0.0. Please read: https://nuxtjs.org/deployments/heroku/
